title: [Large-Scale] Instructional Development Program Design for Improving Online Education Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operational experience with online education platforms and ability to utilize smartphone-based learning tools
context.additional_context: Undergraduate students in medical/legal/technical fields, operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three interaction strategies to enhance learner engagement when designing online courses.
Learners design educational content adhering to smartphone-optimized production guidelines with over 80% compliance.
Develop at least three integrated assessment systems for offline/online activities in a blended learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
